workshoptitle: Learn Analytics and Machine Learning with this Red Bull Racing workshop

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: What makes a GREAT Grand Prix? And how can we make it even better? In this workshop you'll learn how to use Analytics and Machine Learning to answer these questions!
